context_bundle.summary: PAD database actions: Open SQL Connection (connection string), Execute SQL Statement (SELECT/INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE), Close SQL Connection. Returns DataTable for queries

onboarding.quick_start: Open SQL connection 'Server=x;Database=y;...' -> Execute SQL 'SELECT * FROM table' -> Process %QueryResult% datatable -> Close connection
common_patterns: Execute SQL statement 'SELECT * FROM Table WHERE col=value' -> %QueryResult% %RowsAffected%
Execute SQL statement 'INSERT INTO Table VALUES(...)' -> %RowsAffected%
known_errors: Connection string format varies by database type
SQL injection risk - parameterize queries where possible
Timeout on large queries - increase timeout parameter
Always close connections to release resources
